title: All Is Dust
description: After saving Earth's space programme from disaster, Kitto Ashton's plans are simple; return to Sol One to collect his missing crew. However, Admiral Fitzbourne has a different task for the young captain. Kitto is given new orders and the ship sets out on a course for Dax Three and the system's supply station. But all is not as it seems and, after a less than friendly welcome, Ashton and his officers find themselves fighting an enemy determined to win at all costs.
author: Leona Grace
